titleStmt.title: A ballad upon the Popish Plot written by a lady of quality.
titleStmt.author: Lady of quality.
Gadbury, John, 1627-1704.
Powis, Elizabeth Somerset Herbert, Duchess of, d. 1691.

notesStmt.note: Attributed by Wing to Elizabeth Powis, and by NUC pre-1956 imprints to John Gadbury.
Bound with "A ballad, the third part, to the same tune."
Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
